author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: One is not born, but rather becomes, a woman.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: I am not free while any woman is unfree, even when her shackles are very different from my own.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: Society cares for the individual only so far as he is profitable.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: It is not love that makes a woman complete; it is her own self.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: When a woman becomes a mother, she is no longer allowed to be an individual.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: The most important problem in life is to become a subject, to have a will of your own.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: To emancipate women is to free men from the tyranny of the masculine.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: Women are not made for the kitchen, nor for submission.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: A woman’s life is shaped by what she is expected to be, not by what she is free to become.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: The first step towards freedom is to recognize one’s own oppression.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: Love, to be true, must be reciprocal.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: The essence of the feminine is to adapt to the role assigned to them by society.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: Sexuality is a social construct, not a biological imperative.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: The feminist revolution is not about replacing one set of patriarchal rules with another; it is about breaking free of the rules altogether.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: Man is defined as a human being and a woman as a female—whenever she behaves as a human being, she is said to imitate the male.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: Freedom is what you do with what’s been done to you.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: The relationship between men and women is one of mutual misunderstanding.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: What we need is not the recognition of the ‘feminine’ but the abolition of all gender roles.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: Women, as well as men, must be able to build their lives on their own values.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: We are all human beings first, regardless of our sex.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: The tragedy of woman’s life is that she has been denied the opportunity to build her own identity.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: The woman who doesn’t allow herself to be defined by society’s norms is often called unnatural.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: In order to become free, a woman must first recognize her own power.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: I had a desire to experience life on my own terms, to experience it fully, before settling for any roles.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: When I was younger, I was naive enough to believe that freedom existed in a perfect world.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: I did not want to be limited by the choices that society had for me as a woman.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: The love of the intellectual life was my first passion, and it was something I pursued beyond anything else.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: The more I questioned the world around me, the more I realized the importance of personal liberation.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: The important thing is not what happens to us, but what we make of what happens.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: I am not afraid of freedom, but the freedom to make decisions often requires courage.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: The power of circumstance shapes our choices, but it cannot dictate our destiny.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: The more I lived, the more I became aware of the complexity of life and the ambiguity of our choices.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: A person’s freedom is not simply the absence of chains, but the ability to act in the world.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: I realized that one cannot truly be free until they understand and accept the limitations that exist.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: The essence of life is to confront it head-on, without denial or avoidance.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: Freedom is not a gift; it is something to be earned every day, with every decision.

author: Simone de Beauvoir
quote: In order to live authentically, one must constantly question the roles that society has imposed.
